resources.string:
Interested in being a trainer on our app? 
 
We would love to have you! Head to www.perfict.co at the sing-up link below to get in touch with other team. 
 
As a trainer for PerFIct, you must: 
-Have a Nationally recognized certefication or degree 
-Have at least (1) year of personal training experience 
-Be capable of creating unique fitness programs for our exercisers. 
 
Still interested? Sign-up below!
